item.title: A Tale Of Two Presidents | Biden Vs. Bukele [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
What makes Buckle the leader that he is, while Biden seems to be slipping more every day?? 

It’s Prayer, praying for the civilians he vowed to serve, while Biden condones the murdering of hundreds of tiny civilians every day. 

You can either have this, or you can have that. You can have a leader like Bukele or you can have a leader like Biden. 

America needs to repent, and beg God to send them a judge like Gideon, a leader who will pray with his cabinet for his civilians. 

Don’t forget to Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America)

https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/

item.title: Queer Politics = The New Age Religion of America?? W/ Joy Pullman [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
With the Sexual Revolution of the 60s a direct affront attack was launched against Christianity, The New Age Religion of Sexual Ideology. One of the many reasons America needs to repent and throw herself upon the mercy of God. 

Joy Pullman counters this attack on Christianity in her book ‘False Flag, Why Queer Politics Mean The End of America’. 

To grab your own copy of Joy’s book:https://bookshop.org/p/books/false-colors-the-flag-of-our-occupation-joy-pullmann/20707173?ean=9781684515875 

Don’t forget to Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America)

item.title: Overturning of Roe v. Wade Gave Christians A Backbone?? (FlashBack Friday) [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
FlashBack Friday comes again, and with it another excellent throwback show. Originally aired on May 3rd 2022 shortley after Roe v. Wade was leaked. The guys were joined by Dr. Grant, Jeff Durbin, David Fowler and Bradley Pierce to discuss the fallout of Roe being overturned. And, whether or not Christians would grow a backbone as a result.

Don’t forget to Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America)

item.description:
How can you vote in a corrupt system? How can you vote if you have nowhere to place your trust?? Today the Knox and Toby are joined by Craig Huey to discuss the problems of mainstream media suppressing information to change the opinions of voters and the outcome of the election.

item.title: How Do We Celebrate in a Dying Country? w/ Jason Whitlock [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Gabe is out of studio to support the Tenessee Ten (I Stand with The Ten), and is joined by Jason Whitlock as he calls in for today’s show. 

How can we celebrate a dying country? Can we in good coincidence celebrate freedom while men and women are being sentenced for singing Psalms at an abortion clinic?? 

Support the “I Stand with The Ten” Campaign:

https://www.operationsaveamerica.org/event/i-stand-with-the-10-campaign/
